bapple.approve: Your appeal has been approved and you may rejoin the server at your convenience. Please make sure to review our /rules once you do. This ticket will be closed in 24 hours or upon acknowledgement.
bapple.deny: Your appeal was denied; Staff do not feel comfortable letting you back on the server at this time. You may re-appeal your ban in 6 months from now. In that time, please use it as an opportunity to grow and understand why your actions were unacceptable and necessitated the ban in the first place. This ticket will be closed in 24 hours or upon acknowledgement.

setup.cmdDescrp: Initializes and sets up the announcement module.
setup.mcRole: The Minecraft role to ping in announcements
setup.notConfigured: ‚ùå Announcement settings not configured. Please run `/announcement-setup` first.

short.name: Short (5-10 minutes)
short.msg: This is a notice that the Minecraft server will be going down for server-side maintenance and updates in about 5 minutes! I'm hoping the server won't be down for super long, but will update in this channel if anything goes awry. Thank you for your patience.

long.name: Long (up to 1 hour or more)
long.msg: This is a notice that the Minecraft server will be going down for server-side maintenance **in about 1-2 hours**! It's honestly unknown how long this will take (could be 15 minutes, could be 1 hour). We will try our best to get everything back up in a reasonable time. Thank you for your patience.

scheduled.short:
{0} This is a notice that the Minecraft Server will be going down for server-side maintenance and updates at approximately <t:{1}:t>. We're hoping the server won't be down for longer than 5-10 minutes, but will update in this channel if anything goes awry. Thank you for your patience.

-# Times shown are in YOUR local timezone
scheduled.long:
{0} This is a notice that the Minecraft server will be going down for server-side maintenance and updates at approximately <t:{1}:t>. It's honestly unknown how long this will take (could be 15 minutes, could be 1 hour). We will try our best to get everything back up in a reasonable time. Thank you for your patience.

-# Times shown are in YOUR local timezone

time.cmdDescrp: Time in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM AM/PM (Central Time).

back-online.success: Updates were successful; server is back online!

time.cmdDescrp: Time in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM AM/PM (Central Time).

update-scheduled.msg:
The update itself shouldn't take too long, but no promises in case there are any issues. There will be another announcement once the server is updated and good to go.

*Times shown are in your local timezone*

version.cmdDescrp: Minecraft version that was updated to.

update-complete.msg:
‚Ä¢ Everything seems to have been updated properly -- there really shouldn't be any bugs, but if anything seems seriously off just let us know!

Thank you for your patience!
